description: The Hyena is... - vicious, that probably describes him best. Driven by hatred all means are right for him to achieve victory! His tactics rely on brutality and ambush both when attacking and defending. His wrath will hit you soon! Be prepared...
taunt_1: The vultures are already drawing circles above you. They have a foreboding of your future - because you are already carrion, nothing more!
taunt_2: Scum! I can smell your fear... it enlivens my spirit!
taunt_3: My men are forcing you back already. Flee as long as you can!
taunt_4: History is written by winners. I will make sure that your names are erased from the books!
anger_1: Each setback proves a further opportunity to learn. Thank you for this lecture.
anger_2: Is that all? Well, I cannot say I am surprised.
plead: Forget about your craving for revenge, I can be of value! Recognising a potential ally would prove greatness of heart - and wisdom!
nervous_1: I curse you! How could you get so far?
nervous_2: I advise you to draw back - or I will seek bitter vengeance!
victory_1: Your efforts are futile! Whatever it is that you plan - I will always be a step ahead!
victory_2: You may loathe my methods but you can hardly deny that they are effective...
victory_3: You are wimps! And there is no room for wimps in the desert! Ha!
victory_4: I have torn apart another enemy. It was a simple matter to me - and a pleasure!
request: You already are in possession of a list of necessary goods - send them now, and do so quickly!
thanks: Hmpf! That should be just about enough...
ally_death: Fool! We should have fought as a pack! Now you are all alone - no hopes for your lot.
congrats: Oh, you have destroyed one of them. I relish how well you have learned from me.
boast: Heavens they are burning bright, in the desert's lonely night! Which Immortal Whole hath born my soule... It was He who brings despair - and final prayer...
help: Only together are we strong; hurry, hasten to my side! It will be for your own benefit!
siege: The embers in my eyes will spark the horrors in the depth of your hearts. I will burn your fortress to the ground and your mortal remains shall be trodden into the dust!
no_attack_1: Go ahead! Some exercise will do you good. But I'm staying out of this.
no_attack_2: Like hell will I follow your amateurish plans.
no_help_1: I myself am planning a slashing blow against our enemies - my men stay where they are though!
no_help_2: Clear off! Crawl away, pray to your fake God; but don't be a pain in the arse!
no_sent: The desert is an inhospitable place. You will have to manage with what you already have!
sent: You may consider yourself fortunate that I am of such mild benevolence.
team_winning: Have I not told you? You can count on my experience. Our enemies are losing ground already!
team_losing: Yappy tykes! Our enemies are working on our defeat! Do something!
help_sent: Do you know? You are a millstone around my neck. It is no good...
will_attack: Yes indeed, trusty friend! Let us go hunting...
